Vigenere decryption

This is a sample from a Vigenere encrypted file.
Your task is to reconstruct the key, and to decrypt the file.

Text is in French, encoded Window codepage

Hereafter a table of frequencies, taken from a same origin document.
First number is ANSI (extended ASCII) code.
